values.common: background-color, border-color, color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, translate, transform
values.position: left, right, top, bottom, inset-inline, inset-block

heading.value: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

body.value: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

base.background: linear-gradient(var(--color), var(--color)), repeating-conic-gradient(var(--checker-fg) 0%, var(--checker-fg) 25%, var(--checker-bg) 0%, var(--checker-bg) 50%) 0% 50% / var(--checker-size) var(--checker-size) !important

_indeterminate.animation: position 1s ease infinite normal none running

range.backgroundImage: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--stripe-color) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 50%, var(--stripe-color) 50%, var(--stripe-color) 75%, transparent 75%, transparent)

swatch.background: linear-gradient(var(--color), var(--color)), repeating-conic-gradient(var(--checker-fg) 0%, var(--checker-fg) 25%, var(--checker-bg) 0%, var(--checker-bg) 50%) 0% 50% / var(--checker-size) var(--checker-size) !important

html.--font-fallback: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, 'Noto Sans', sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji'

code, kbd, samp, pre.--font-mono-fallback: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New'

&:where(html, .chakra-theme).--ck-fonts-heading: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"
&:where(html, .chakra-theme).--ck-fonts-body: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

:root &, .light &.--ck-shadows-xs: 0px 1px 2px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 10%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 20%, transparent)
:root &, .light &.--ck-shadows-sm: 0px 2px 4px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 10%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 30%, transparent)
:root &, .light &.--ck-shadows-md: 0px 4px 8px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 10%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 30%, transparent)
:root &, .light &.--ck-shadows-lg: 0px 8px 16px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 10%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 30%, transparent)
:root &, .light &.--ck-shadows-xl: 0px 16px 24px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 10%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 30%, transparent)
:root &, .light &.--ck-shadows-2xl: 0px 24px 40px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 16%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-900) 30%, transparent)

.dark &, .dark .chakra-theme:not(.light).--ck-shadows-xs: 0px 1px 1px color-mix(in srgb, black 64%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px inset color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-300) 20%, transparent)
.dark &, .dark .chakra-theme:not(.light).--ck-shadows-sm: 0px 2px 4px color-mix(in srgb, black 64%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px inset color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-300) 30%, transparent)
.dark &, .dark .chakra-theme:not(.light).--ck-shadows-md: 0px 4px 8px color-mix(in srgb, black 64%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px inset color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-300) 30%, transparent)
.dark &, .dark .chakra-theme:not(.light).--ck-shadows-lg: 0px 8px 16px color-mix(in srgb, black 64%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px inset color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-300) 30%, transparent)
.dark &, .dark .chakra-theme:not(.light).--ck-shadows-xl: 0px 16px 24px color-mix(in srgb, black 64%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px inset color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-300) 30%, transparent)
.dark &, .dark .chakra-theme:not(.light).--ck-shadows-2xl: 0px 24px 40px color-mix(in srgb, black 64%, transparent), 0px 0px 1px inset color-mix(in srgb, var(--ck-colors-gray-300) 30%, transparent)
